version_description:
- NEW AR creatures: Spinosaurus, Velociraptor, Stegosaurus, Triceratops
- NEW table game mode for playing with creatures right on your table
- NEW interactions with monsters like making them move the direction you like, making them follow you wherever you go, hitting them to make them fall down
- NEW parallel universe where dinosaurs used to live, you can visit it right away
- Major UI improvements: new animations, improved UI experience
- Bug fixes
+Fixed bug connected with disappearance of Dinos

Dear Users!

We’ve added something new to our Monster Park. Charming and mysterious dinosaurs from the Jurassic period are available with this version. Add amazing Jurassic dinos to your collection and enjoy interacting with those prehistoric creatures anytime and anywhere.

Keep the reviews coming in!
We appreciate all the feedback.

Are you ready for the great Monster Park update?

•We discovered several horrible spiders and added them to the app - BLACK WIDOW, DEATH HEAD, and TARANTULA. Bring these creepy crawlies into your world!

•Try a new MULTIPLAYER GAME MODE. With the support of Apple’s ARKit 2, several players can rule their monsters simultaneously and interact with each other in the augmented reality world. Share the amazing AR experience with your friends or family!

Enjoy new creatures and features!
We are always happy to get your ratings and reviews on the App Store.

Are you ready for the great Monster Park update?

•We discovered several horrible spiders and added them to the app - BLACK WIDOW, DEATH HEAD, and TARANTULA. Bring these creepy crawlies into your world!

•Try a new MULTIPLAYER GAME MODE. With the support of Apple’s ARKit 2, several players can rule their monsters simultaneously and interact with each other in the augmented reality world. Share the amazing AR experience with your friends or family!

Improvements and bug fixes:

+ Fixed bugs with video recording.
+ Improved synchronization for multiplayer mode.

Enjoy new creatures and features!
We are always happy to get your ratings and reviews on the App Store.

Halloween is coming and we’ve transformed Monster Park for this eerily beautiful season. The app is spookier than ever now!

Check out the latest version if you dare and welcome our ghoulishly delightful special guests. Once in the world of devilish creatures, create an astonishing collection of frightening Halloween photos and videos with the blood-curdling Werewolf, bone-chilling Weeper, giant spiders and other horrible monsters.

Just a little warning for you guys - beware of the portal!

Don’t forget to leave us feedback after the most ominous night of the year.

• Some minor bug fixes and performance improvements

Any feedback would be greatly appreciated.
Thank you for using Monster Park!

New Year in Monster Park!

Experience the magical atmosphere of Christmas and meet our new creatures for this festive season. Amazing Ice Monsters (Giant, Zombie) and cute Santa Claus riding a Triceratops will embellish your collection of AR photos and videos.

Thank you for staying with us.
Wishing you all the best for the coming year!

Chinese New Year in Monster Park!

•We've added flying dragons to celebrate the Spring Festival:

- Fire Dragon
- Earth Dragon
- Water Dragon
- Metal Dragon
- Wood Dragon

•As always, minor bug fixes and performance improvements to make your augmented reality experience even better.

For questions, remarks or suggestions: support@vitotechnology.com
Your feedback is highly appreciated.

Enjoy!

⁕New Feature⁕

Now you can change the monster's skin. Experiment with textures and colors, choose any skin pattern or paint your own.

Enjoy!
Your feedback would be highly appreciated.

+ Video recording fixed

⁕New Feature⁕
Now you can change the monster's skin. Experiment with textures and colors, choose any skin pattern or paint your own.
